price: Dájúdájú èmi bá obìnrin kan (ní ìlú Saba’i), tó ń jọba lé wọn lórí. Wọ́n fún un ní gbogbo n̄ǹkan. Ó sì ní ìtẹ́ ńlá kan.
arabic: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innī wajadttu im'ra-atan tamlikuhum waūtiyat min kulli shayin walahā ʿarshun ʿaẓīmun
